doc.previous: Fiordland National Park Abel Tasman National Park Westland National Park Aoraki Mount Cook National Park Queenstown Kaikoura and the Marlborough Sounds are regarded as the main tourism destinations in the South Island and amongst the Top 10 destinations in New Zealand 56
